thread.title: After Conway Says Trump Has Full Confidence in Flynn, Spicer Says He’s ‘Evaluating the Situation’
thread.title_full: After Conway Says Trump Has Full Confidence in Flynn, Spicer Says He’s ‘Evaluating the Situation’

author: Josh Feldman
title: After Conway Says Trump Has Full Confidence in Flynn, Spicer Says He’s ‘Evaluating the Situation’
text:
After Conway Says Trump Has Full Confidence in Flynn, Spicer Says He’s ‘Evaluating the Situation’ by Josh Feldman | 5:26   
White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer issued a brief statement late this afternoon on questions surrounding National Security Advisor Michael Flynn . 
After a report that Flynn had apparently discussed sanctions with a Russian official despite initial denials , many people have publicly been calling on President Trump to fire Flynn. 
Kellyanne Conway said on MSNBC this afternoon that Flynn has Trump’s “full confidence,” but about an hour later Spicer issued the following statement: Spicer just read a statement on Flynn: “The President is evaluating the situation…” pic.twitter.com/12rr4ArXNQ 
— Bradd Jaffy (@BraddJaffy) February 13, 2017 
[ image via screengrab ]
